title: Secret Special Training
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Take this, and that.... Ah, I lost again.... You’re really good at games, aren’t you, Rina-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s because I like playing them. You’ll get good at something when you’ve done it enough times.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I see, I guess I have to play more after all, huh. I need to give it my all....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Riko-san.... it’s about time you tell me.... why you’re doing special training for games.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Guh. Y-, you’re right.... Rina-chan, don’t tell anyone, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Of course.... I’ll keep my promise.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You see, I was on Yoshiko-chan’s gaming live stream the other day, but I couldn’t beat her in the game even once.... So I wanted to train for the next time I’ll be there....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I see, as the little demon Lili, you need to win against Yoshiko-cha-.... no, Yohane-chan, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Well, that’s not what I meant, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s okay, Riko-san. I’ll keep your secret! I’ll come up with a special plan to improve your ability in games.... so that you can beat Yohane-chan. Rina-chan’s board「Determined」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
